===Sets marine color.===

= Description =

Sets marines with 3 different colors and percentage of the marines you want to give these colors.
==Sets the color of normal marines.== 
======asw_marine_color====== 
{|
|| [[asw_version.wiki|Server Version]] Added || Default || [[CvarFlags.wiki|CvarFlags]] || [ParamType Parameter Type] 
|-
|| 1.3.9 || `255 255 255` || [[FCVAR_NONE.wiki|FCVAR_NONE]] || [Color255] 
|}

==Sets a second color for marines.==
======asw_marine_color2======
{|
|| [[asw_version.wiki|Server Version]] Added || Default || [[CvarFlags.wiki|CvarFlags]] || [ParamType Parameter Type] 
|-
|| 1.3.9 || `255 255 255` || [[FCVAR_NONE.wiki|FCVAR_NONE]] || [Color255] 
|}
======asw_marine_color2_percent======
Sets the percentage of the marines want to give the second color, sets the value in between 0 - 1. 
{|
|| [[asw_version.wiki|Server Version]] Added || Default || [[CvarFlags.wiki|CvarFlags]] || [ParamType Parameter Type] 
|-
|| 1.3.9 || `0` || [[FCVAR_NONE.wiki|FCVAR_NONE]] || [Float] 
|}
